content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'test1115_auto' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.test1115_auto
	(
	 [TCOTCExt] char(11),
	 [YearWeekInt] int
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH(TCOTCExt),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
	PARTITION (YearWeekInt RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES (
		202101,202102,202103,202104,202105,202106,202107,202108,202109,202110,
		202111,202112,202113,202114,202115,202116,202117,202118,202119,202120,
		202121,202122,202123,202124,202125,202126,202127,202128,202129,202130,
		202131,202132,202133,202134,202135,202136,202137,202138,202139,202140,
		202141,202142,202143,202144,202145,202146,202147,202148,202149,202150,
		202151,202152,
		202201,202202,202203,202204,202205,202206,202207,202208,202209,202210,
		202211,202212,202213,202214,202215,202216,202217,202218,202219,202220,
		202221,202222,202223,202224,202225,202226,202227,202228,202229,202230,
		202231,202232,202233,202234,202235,202236,202237,202238,202239
	))
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_test1115_auto
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.test1115_auto
(TCOTCExt 1, YearWeekInt 2)
FROM 'https://dlsginatest.dfs.core.windows.net/users/CETAS/RamzTest/testforgina.parquet/QID119083_20221115_55855_0.parq.gz'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'gzip'
)
--END
GO

CREATE TABLE dbo.test1115_2partition
	--(
	-- [TCOTCExt] char(11),
	-- [YearWeekInt] int
	--)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH(TCOTCExt),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
	PARTITION (YearWeekInt RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES (
		202101,202201
	))
	)
AS SELECT * FROM dbo.test1115_auto
GO


--SELECT count(*) FROM dbo.test1115_auto
